title: Launch New Jersey in Online Store
description: A team is launching a new alternate jersey and needs to make it available for sale in the online store at a specific time.

tasks.description: Create a new product page for the jersey in the e-commerce system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets up the product page with images, description, and pricing.

tasks.description: Upload the inventory levels for each size.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent inputs the stock levels for the new jersey.

tasks.description: Schedule the product page to go live at the designated launch time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent schedules the page to become visible to the public at the correct time.
